text:
A former Village Administrative Officer and his associate have been sentenced to undergo three years of imprisonment for taking bribe.

According to prosecution, A. Panneerselvam (60), who was the VAO of Melapalayam here, demanded Rs.900 for giving ‘patta’ in the name of J. Abubucker of Melapalayam. When Abubucker filed a complaint with the Directorate of Vigilance and Anti-Corruption Police, Panneerselvam was arrested when he received the bribe through broker Noordeen on November 17, 2003.
title: TAMIL NADU
